sentences.english: O, boy! Is Last night's wine of Loess Plateau sweet?
sentences.chinese: 男孩啊，黄土高坡昨夜的酒，可好。

sentences.english: You were in balance last night when you closed?
sentences.chinese: 昨夜结束业务时，您的帐目是平衡的吧？

sentences.english: I thought you said last night no one knew anything.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你说昨夜之前没人知道任何事。

sentences.english: He took a breath to clear away the cobwebs of the night as the raven flapped away.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了口气吹走昨夜的蜘蛛网，乌鸦随之扑翅飞开。

sentences.english: Almost a hundred people perished in the hotel fire last night.
sentences.chinese: 近百人在昨夜旅馆的大火中丧生。

sentences.english: Two suspicious-looking fellows were seen hanging around the campus .
sentences.chinese: 昨夜有人看见两个形迹可疑的人在校园徘徊。

sentences.english: I didn't fall asleep until two o'clock last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨夜里直到两点钟才睡着觉。

sentences.english: She received a punishment for being late last night.
sentences.chinese: 她由于昨夜晚归受到了惩罚。

sentences.english: There was a sharp earthquake last night,and the building rocked violently.
sentences.chinese: 昨夜发生了一次剧烈地震，建筑物摇晃得很厉害。

sentences.english: Her eyes ached because she didn't sleep well last night.
sentences.chinese: 由于昨夜没睡好，她的眼睛隐隐作痛。

sentences.english: April 20th. The first march organized by the Beijing University Student Union Preparation Committee, protesting the violent acts of the army and police the night before at the gate of Xinhua Men.
sentences.chinese: 组织的第一次游行，抗议昨夜军警在新华门的暴行。

sentences.english: Last night I heard him driving his pigs to markets.
sentences.chinese: 昨夜我听见他鼾声如雷。

sentences.english: Yesternight father had not finished sleeping.
Last night the scenery was striking and picturesque .
I recalled last night I looked at it quite long.
sentences.chinese: 想起昨夜入梦前我曾望住它良久。

sentences.english: In San Francisco, three men robbed a bank last night.
sentences.chinese: 在旧金山，昨夜有三个人抢了一家银行。

definition: day after day/for several days running
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
